The faith of Jesus in the future embraced all his Father‘s works3 his zeal to realise that faith was correspond- ingly wide. Observe, too, the intensity of the effort as Jesus commanded it. Was ever scheme for gain, race for prize ardour of love, rage for conflict, intense in human imagery ? These conceptions pale in passion and in interest beside the struggle for human salvation‚ as Jesus depicts it. His first part is always to show that thought fails to express God's intensity in the business.
